subject: philomena cunk christmas special
body:
i’m thankful that a while ago my friend david recommended philomena cunk to me and tonight we watched the philomena cunk christmas special which made me laugh very hard:

[https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=hNA6b66bILk](https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=hNA6b66bILk)
